name: CUSTOM Ingredients #7
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius

  assign cards_mt = section.settings.cards_mt
  assign cards_mt_mobile = section.settings.cards_mt_mobile
  assign cards_gap_mobile = section.settings.cards_gap_mobile
  assign cards_gap = section.settings.cards_gap
  assign cards_view_mobile = section.settings.cards_view_mobile
  assign cards_view = section.settings.cards_view

  assign card_border_thickness = section.settings.card_border_thickness
  assign card_border_color = section.settings.card_border_color
  assign card_align = section.settings.card_align
  assign card_align_mobile = section.settings.card_align_mobile
  assign content_gap = section.settings.content_gap
  assign content_gap_mobile = section.settings.content_gap_mobile

  assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile
  assign image_radius = section.settings.image_radius
  assign image_border_thickness = section.settings.image_border_thickness
  assign image_border_color = section.settings.image_border_color

  assign title_custom = section.settings.title_custom
  assign title_font = section.settings.title_font
  assign title_size = section.settings.title_size
  assign title_size_mobile = section.settings.title_size_mobile
  assign title_height = section.settings.title_height
  assign title_color = section.settings.title_color
  assign title_mt = section.settings.title_mt
  assign title_mt_mobile = section.settings.title_mt_mobile

  assign subtitle_custom = section.settings.subtitle_custom
  assign subtitle_font = section.settings.subtitle_font
  assign subtitle_size = section.settings.subtitle_size
  assign subtitle_size_mobile = section.settings.subtitle_size_mobile
  assign subtitle_height = section.settings.subtitle_height
  assign subtitle_color = section.settings.subtitle_color
  assign subtitle_mt = section.settings.subtitle_mt
  assign subtitle_mt_mobile = section.settings.subtitle_mt_mobile

  assign text_custom = section.settings.text_custom
  assign text_font = section.settings.text_font
  assign text_size = section.settings.text_size
  assign text_size_mobile = section.settings.text_size_mobile
  assign text_height = section.settings.text_height
  assign text_color = section.settings.text_color
  assign text_mt = section.settings.text_mt
  assign text_mt_mobile = section.settings.text_mt_mobile

  assign icon_size = section.settings.icon_size
  assign icon_size_mobile = section.settings.icon_size_mobile
  assign close_icon_size = section.settings.close_icon_size
  assign close_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.close_icon_size_mobile
  assign plus_icon_bg_color = section.settings.plus_icon_bg_color
  assign plus_icon_color = section.settings.plus_icon_color
  assign plus_icon_bg_hover_color = section.settings.plus_icon_bg_hover_color
  assign plus_icon_hover_color = section.settings.plus_icon_hover_color
  assign close_icon_bg_color = section.settings.close_icon_bg_color
  assign close_icon_color = section.settings.close_icon_color
  assign close_icon_bg_hover_color = section.settings.close_icon_bg_hover_color
  assign close_icon_hover_color = section.settings.close_icon_hover_color

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_radius = section.settings.arrow_radius
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile
  assign arrow_hover_effect = section.settings.arrow_hover_effect

  assign scrollbar_height = section.settings.scrollbar_height
  assign scrollbar_show_desktop = section.settings.scrollbar_show_desktop
  assign scrollbar_show_mobile = section.settings.scrollbar_show_mobile
  assign scrollbar_drag_bg_color = section.settings.scrollbar_drag_bg_color
  assign scrollbar_bg_color = section.settings.scrollbar_bg_color

  assign sidebar_width = section.settings.sidebar_width
  assign sidebar_bg_color = section.settings.sidebar_bg_color
  assign sidebar_padding_horizontal = section.settings.sidebar_padding_horizontal
  assign sidebar_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.sidebar_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign sidebar_padding_vertical = section.settings.sidebar_padding_vertical
  assign sidebar_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.sidebar_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign sidebar_align = section.settings.sidebar_align
  assign sidebar_align_mobile = section.settings.sidebar_align_mobile

  assign sidebar_title_custom = section.settings.sidebar_title_custom
  assign sidebar_title_font = section.settings.sidebar_title_font
  assign sidebar_title_size = section.settings.sidebar_title_size
  assign sidebar_title_size_mobile = section.settings.sidebar_title_size_mobile
  assign sidebar_title_height = section.settings.sidebar_title_height
  assign sidebar_title_color = section.settings.sidebar_title_color

  assign sidebar_subtext_custom = section.settings.sidebar_subtext_custom
  assign sidebar_subtext_font = section.settings.sidebar_subtext_font
  assign sidebar_subtext_size = section.settings.sidebar_subtext_size
  assign sidebar_subtext_size_mobile = section.settings.sidebar_subtext_size_mobile
  assign sidebar_subtext_height = section.settings.sidebar_subtext_height
  assign sidebar_subtext_color = section.settings.sidebar_subtext_color
  assign sidebar_subtext_mt = section.settings.sidebar_subtext_mt
  assign sidebar_subtext_mt_mobile = section.settings.sidebar_subtext_mt_mobile

  assign sidebar_image_ratio = section.settings.sidebar_image_ratio
  assign sidebar_image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.sidebar_image_ratio_mobile
  assign sidebar_image_radius = section.settings.sidebar_image_radius
  assign sidebar_image_border_thickness = section.settings.sidebar_image_border_thickness
  assign sidebar_image_border_color = section.settings.sidebar_image_border_color

  assign sidebar_heading_custom = section.settings.sidebar_heading_custom
  assign sidebar_heading_font = section.settings.sidebar_heading_font
  assign sidebar_heading_size = section.settings.sidebar_heading_size
  assign sidebar_heading_size_mobile = section.settings.sidebar_heading_size_mobile
  assign sidebar_heading_height = section.settings.sidebar_heading_height
  assign sidebar_heading_color = section.settings.sidebar_heading_color
  assign sidebar_heading_mt = section.settings.sidebar_heading_mt
  assign sidebar_heading_mt_mobile = section.settings.sidebar_heading_mt_mobile

  assign sidebar_text_custom = section.settings.sidebar_text_custom
  assign sidebar_text_font = section.settings.sidebar_text_font
  assign sidebar_text_size = section.settings.sidebar_text_size
  assign sidebar_text_size_mobile = section.settings.sidebar_text_size_mobile
  assign sidebar_text_height = section.settings.sidebar_text_height
  assign sidebar_text_color = section.settings.sidebar_text_color
  assign sidebar_text_mt = section.settings.sidebar_text_mt
  assign sidebar_text_mt_mobile = section.settings.sidebar_text_mt_mobile

  assign loading_attribute = 'eager'
  if lazy 
    assign loading_attribute = 'lazy' 
  endif 
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{  title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  subtitle_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  sidebar_title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  sidebar_subtext_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  sidebar_heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  sidebar_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ cards_mt_mobile }}px;
    overflow: visible !important;
    min-width: 0 !important;
    width: 100% !important;
  }

  .ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }} .swiper-wrapper {
    align-items: stretch !important;
  }

  .ingredients-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    height: auto !important;
  }
  
  .ingredients-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
    border: {{ image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ image_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .ingredients-slide-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .ingredients-slide-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .ingredients-slide-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .ingredients-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;  
    margin-top: {{ title_mt_mobile }}px;
    text-align: {{ card_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ title_height }}%;
    color: {{ title_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
    padding: 0 10px;
  }

  .ingredient-content-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: space-between;
    gap: {{ content_gap_mobile }}px; 
  }

  .ingredients-slide-bottom-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    padding: 0px 8px 16px 8px;
    border-top: {{ card_border_thickness }}px solid {{ card_border_color }}
  }

  .ingredients-slide-subtitle-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;  
    margin-top: {{ subtitle_mt_mobile }}px;
    text-align: {{ card_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ subtitle_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ subtitle_height }}%;
    color: {{ subtitle_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }
  
  .ingredients-slide-text-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;  
    margin-top: {{ text_mt_mobile }}px;
    text-align: {{ card_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ text_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ text_height }}%;
    color: {{ text_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .ingredients-source-icon-{{ section.id }} {
    border-radius: 50%;
    overflow: hidden;
    cursor: pointer;
    width: {{ icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ icon_size_mobile }}px;
  }

  .ingredients-source-icon-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .ingredients-source-icon-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: {{ plus_icon_bg_color }};
    transition: all 0.1s ease 0s;
  }

  .ingredients-source-icon-{{ section.id }}:hover svg {
    transition: all 0.1s ease 0s;
    background-color: {{ plus_icon_bg_hover_color }};
  }

  .ingredients-source-icon-{{ section.id }} svg g {
    stroke: {{ plus_icon_color }};
    transition: all 0.1s ease 0s;
  }

  .ingredients-source-icon-{{ section.id }}:hover svg g {
    transition: all 0.1s ease 0s;
    stroke: {{ plus_icon_hover_color }};
  }
  
  .ingredients-navigation-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    gap: 10px;
    margin-top: 20px;
  }
  
  .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: 0px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ arrow_radius }}px;
    background: transparent;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    flex-shrink: 0;
    /* box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,.15); */
  }

  .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon,
  .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon {
    pointer-events: none;
    place-items: center;
    display: grid;
  }

  .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
  .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    transform: rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-style: solid;
    border: 0px;
    border-right: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-top: 2px solid currentColor;
    position: relative;
    left: -1px;
  }

  .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    left: unset;
    right: -1px;
    border-right: 0px;
    border-top: 0px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-left: 2px solid currentColor;
  }

  .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
  .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    height: 1.6px;
    transform-origin: center;
    opacity: 0;
    background: currentColor;
    transform: scaleX(.5);
  }

  .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} span,
  .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} span {
    color: {{ arrow_color }};
  }

  .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0.5;
  }

  .ingredients-scrollbar-{{ section.id }} {
    flex: 1 1 auto;
    position: static !important;
    height: {{ scrollbar_height }}px !important;
    background-color: {{ scrollbar_bg_color }} !important;
    z-index: 2 !important;
  }

  .ingredients-scrollbar-{{ section.id }} .swiper-scrollbar-drag {
    display: block !important;
    background-color: {{ scrollbar_drag_bg_color }}!important;
  }

   .ingredients-modal-{{ section.id }} {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100vw;
    height: 100vh;
    z-index: -1;
    display: flex;
    z-index: -1;
    opacity: 0;
    pointer-events: none;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: right;
    -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
    backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
    background-color: #000000ce;   
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }
  
  .ingredients-modal-{{ section.id }}.active {
    opacity: 1;
    z-index: 9999;
    pointer-events: all;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .ingredients-modal-inner-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    position: relative;
    overflow-y: auto;
    scrollbar-width: none;
    -ms-overflow-style: none; 
    transform: translateX(100%);
    padding: {{ sidebar_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ sidebar_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    background-color: {{ sidebar_bg_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .ingredients-modal-inner-{{ section.id }}.active {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    transform: translateX(0%);
  }

  .ingredients-modal-inner-{{ section.id }}::-webkit-scrollbar {
    display: none;
  }

  .ingredients-modal-content-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ icon_size_mobile }}px;
    display: none;
    padding-bottom: 80px;
  }

  .ingredients-modal-content-{{ section.id }}.active {
    display: block;
  }

  .ingredients-sidebar-image-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block;
    margin-top: {{ sidebar_heading_mt_mobile }}px;
    border: {{ sidebar_image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ sidebar_image_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ sidebar_image_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
    padding: 0;
  }

  .ingredients-sidebar-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .ingredients-sidebar-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .ingredients-sidebar-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .ingredients-sidebar-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;  
    text-align: {{ sidebar_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ sidebar_title_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ sidebar_title_height }}%;
    color: {{ sidebar_title_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .ingredients-sidebar-subtext-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0px;  
    margin-top: {{ sidebar_subtext_mt_mobile }}px;
    text-align: {{ sidebar_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ sidebar_subtext_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ sidebar_subtext_height }}%;
    color: {{ sidebar_subtext_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .ingredients-sidebar-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;  
    padding-top: {{ sidebar_heading_mt_mobile }}px;
    text-align: {{ sidebar_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ sidebar_heading_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ sidebar_heading_height }}%;
    color: {{ sidebar_heading_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .ingredients-sidebar-heading-{{ section.id }}:first-child {
    border: 0px !important;
  }

  .ingredients-sidebar-heading-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
    border-top: {{ card_border_thickness }}px solid {{ card_border_color }};
  }

  .ingredients-sidebar-text-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ sidebar_text_mt_mobile }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ sidebar_heading_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .ingredients-sidebar-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0px;    
    text-align: {{ sidebar_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ sidebar_text_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ sidebar_text_height }}%;
    color: {{ sidebar_text_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }
  
  .ingredients-close-modal-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: 0;
    position: absolute;
    top: 15px;
    right: 15px;
    box-shadow: none;
    border: 0px;
    cursor: pointer;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 2;
    padding: 10px;
    background-color: {{ close_icon_bg_color }};
    overflow: hidden;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .ingredients-close-modal-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    background-color: {{ close_icon_bg_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .ingredients-close-modal-{{ section.id }} svg {
    position: relative;
    z-index: 2;
    display: block;
    width: {{ close_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ close_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .ingredients-close-modal-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ close_icon_color }};   
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .ingredients-close-modal-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ close_icon_hover_color }}; 
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .ingredients-sidebar-table-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
    gap: 10px;
    border-top: {{ card_border_thickness }}px solid {{ card_border_color }}; 
    padding: 0;
  }

  .ingredients-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
  }
  
  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ cards_mt }}px;
    }

    .ingredients-title-{{ section.id }} {    
      margin-top: {{ title_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ card_align }};
      font-size: {{ title_size }}px;    
    }

    .ingredient-content-{{ section.id }} {
      gap: {{ content_gap }}px; 
    }

    .ingredients-slide-subtitle-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ subtitle_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ card_align }};
      font-size: {{ subtitle_size }}px;    
    }
    
    .ingredients-slide-text-{{ section.id }} {   
      margin-top: {{ text_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ card_align }};
      font-size: {{ text_size }}px;     
    }

    .ingredients-source-icon-{{ section.id }} { 
      width: {{ icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ icon_size }}px;
    }
    
    .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }

    .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
    .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    }

    .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
    .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    }

    .ingredients-navigation-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: 20px;
      justify-content: space-between;
    }
    
    .ingredients-modal-inner-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ sidebar_width }}px;
      padding: {{ sidebar_padding_vertical }}px {{ sidebar_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .ingredients-sidebar-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      padding-top: {{ sidebar_heading_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ sidebar_align }};
      font-size: {{ sidebar_heading_size }}px;    
    }    

    .ingredients-sidebar-image-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ sidebar_heading_mt }}px; 
    }

    .ingredients-sidebar-title-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ sidebar_align }};
      font-size: {{ sidebar_title_size }}px;
    }
  
    .ingredients-sidebar-subtext-{{ section.id }} * {
      margin-top: {{ sidebar_subtext_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ sidebar_align }};
      font-size: {{ sidebar_subtext_size }}px;
    }

    .ingredients-sidebar-text-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ sidebar_text_mt }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ sidebar_heading_mt }}px;
    }

    .ingredients-modal-content-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ icon_size }}px;
    }

    .ingredients-sidebar-text-{{ section.id }} * {       
      text-align: {{ sidebar_align }};
      font-size: {{ sidebar_text_size }}px;     
    } 

    .ingredients-close-modal-{{ section.id }} svg {
      width: {{ close_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ close_icon_size }}px;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if title_custom %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ title_font.family }}, {{ title_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ title_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ title_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if subtitle_custom %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-slide-subtitle-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ subtitle_font.family }}, {{ subtitle_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ subtitle_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ subtitle_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if text_custom %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-slide-text-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ text_font.family }}, {{ text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if sidebar_title_custom %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-sidebar-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ sidebar_title_font.family }}, {{ sidebar_title_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ sidebar_title_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ sidebar_title_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if sidebar_subtext_custom %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-sidebar-subtext-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ sidebar_subtext_font.family }}, {{ sidebar_subtext_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ sidebar_subtext_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ sidebar_subtext_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if sidebar_heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-sidebar-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ sidebar_heading_font.family }}, {{ sidebar_heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ sidebar_heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ sidebar_heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if sidebar_text_custom %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-sidebar-text-{{ section.id }} *  {
      font-family: {{ sidebar_text_font.family }}, {{ sidebar_text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ sidebar_text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ sidebar_text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}


{% if image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
  .ingredients-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
    aspect-ratio: 12/8;
  }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 12/12;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .ingredients-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
      }
    }
    
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .ingredients-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/8;
      }
    }  
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .ingredients-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/12;
      }
    }    
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
     @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .ingredients-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: auto;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if sidebar_image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-sidebar-image-{{ section.id }}  {
      aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif sidebar_image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
  .ingredients-sidebar-image-{{ section.id }}  {
    aspect-ratio: 12/8;
  }
  </style>
{% elsif sidebar_image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-sidebar-image-{{ section.id }}  {
      aspect-ratio: 12/12;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-sidebar-image-{{ section.id }}  {
      aspect-ratio: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if sidebar_image_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .ingredients-sidebar-image-{{ section.id }}  {
        aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
      }
    }
    
  </style>
{% elsif sidebar_image_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .ingredients-sidebar-image-{{ section.id }}  {
        aspect-ratio: 12/8;
      }
    }  
  </style>
{% elsif sidebar_image_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .ingredients-sidebar-image-{{ section.id }}  {
        aspect-ratio: 12/12;
      }
    }    
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
     @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .ingredients-sidebar-image-{{ section.id }}  {
        aspect-ratio: auto;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}


{% if arrow_hover_effect == "color" %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
      border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
      background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};
    }
  
    .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon,
    .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon {
      color: {{ arrow_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "scale" %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transform: scale(0.9);
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
      .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
        transform: scale(0.9);
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "arrow" %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
  
    .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(-1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
    
    .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after,
    .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: scaleX(1);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if scrollbar_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-scrollbar-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex !important;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-scrollbar-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if scrollbar_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .ingredients-scrollbar-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .ingredients-scrollbar-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}


{% for block in section.blocks %}
  {% case block.type %}
    {% when 'heading' %}  
      <style>
        {{  block.settings.heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

        .ingredients-heading-{{ block.id }} {
          text-align: {{ block.settings.heading_align_mobile }};
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.heading_mt_mobile }}px;
        }
      
        .ingredients-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
          margin: 0;
          font-size: {{ block.settings.heading_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.heading_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.heading_height }}%;
          text-transform: unset;
          word-break: break-word;
          font-weight: 700;
        }

        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
          
          .ingredients-heading-{{ block.id }} {
            max-width: {{ block.settings.heading_max_width }}%;
            text-align: {{ block.settings.heading_align }};
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.heading_mt }}px;
          }
        
          .ingredients-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-size: {{ block.settings.heading_size }}px;
          }
        }          
      </style>
        
      {% if block.settings.heading_custom %}
        <style>
          .ingredients-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-family: {{ block.settings.heading_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.heading_font.fallback_families }};
            font-weight: {{ block.settings.heading_font.weight }};
            font-style: {{ block.settings.heading_font.style }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}

      {% if block.settings.heading_align == "center" %}
        <style>
          @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .ingredients-heading-{{ block.id }} {
              margin-left: auto;
              margin-right: auto;
            } 
          }
        </style>
      {% elsif block.settings.heading_align == "right" %}
        <style>
          @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .ingredients-heading-{{ block.id }} {
              margin-left: auto;
              margin-right: 0px;
            } 
          }
        </style>
      {% else %}
        <style>
          @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .ingredients-heading-{{ block.id }} {
              margin-left: 0px;
              margin-right: 0px;
            } 
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}
      
  {% endcase %}
{% endfor %}

{% comment %} PREVIEW {% endcomment %}
<style>
  .ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .swiper-wrapper {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .ingredients-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
  }

  .ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .ingredients-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
    margin-left: {{ cards_gap_mobile }}px;
  } 

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {
    .ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .ingredients-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
      margin-left: {{ cards_gap }}px;
    } 

    .ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .ingredients-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      width: calc(100% / {{ cards_view }} - ({{ cards_gap }}px));
    }
  }
</style>


<div class="section-{{ section.id }} ingredients-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      {% for block in section.blocks %}
        {% case block.type %}
          {% when 'heading'%}
            {% if block.settings.heading != blank %}
              <div class="ingredients-heading-{{ block.id }}">
                {{ block.settings.heading }}
              </div>
            {% endif %}         
        {% endcase %}
      {% endfor %}

      <div class="ingredients-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
        <div class="ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }} preview swiper"
          data-gap="{{ cards_gap }}"
          data-gap-mobile="{{ cards_gap_mobile }}"
          data-view="{{ cards_view }}"
          data-view-mobile="{{ cards_view_mobile }}">
          <div class="swiper-wrapper">
            {% for block in section.blocks %}
              {% if block.type == 'card' %}
                <div class="ingredients-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                  <div class="ingredients-slide-image-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.image != blank %}               
                      {{ block.settings.image | image_url: width: 1500 | image_tag:
                        loading: loading_attribute,
                        sizes: "(min-width: 1024px) 100vw, 100vw",
                        widths: '375, 550, 750, 1100, 1500, 1780, 2000, 3000',
                        alt: block.settings.image.alt | escape
                      }}
                    {% else %}
                      {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                    {% endif %}  
                  </div>
  
                  <div class="ingredient-content-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.title != blank %}
                      <p class="ingredients-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.title }}</p>
                    {% endif %}
  
                    <div class="ingredients-slide-bottom-{{ section.id }}">
                      <div>
                        {% if block.settings.subtitle %}
                          <p class="ingredients-slide-subtitle-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.subtitle }}</p>
                        {% endif %}
                        {% if block.settings.text %}
                          <p class="ingredients-slide-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</p>
                        {% endif %}
                      </div>
                      <div class="ingredients-source-icon-{{ section.id }}" id="{{ block.id }}">
                        <svg data-element="PlusIconElement" data-source-file="IngredientCard.js" data-sentry-element="PlusIconElement" data-sentry-source-file="IngredientCard.js" width="24" height="24" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd" stroke="none" stroke-width="1"><g fill-rule="nonzero"><g><g><g><g transform="translate(-153.000000, -497.000000) translate(153.000000, 188.000000) translate(0.000000, 132.000000) translate(0.000000, 177.000000)"><circl cx="12" cy="12" r="12" fill="#142B6F" fill-opacity=".51"></circl><g stroke="#FFF" stroke-linecap="square" stroke-width="2"><path d="M0,4 L8,4" transform="translate(8.000000, 8.000000)"></path><path d="M0,4 L8,4" transform="translate(8.000000, 8.000000) translate(4.000000, 4.000000) rotate(-270.000000) translate(-4.000000, -4.000000)"></path></g></g></g></g></g></g></g></svg>
                      </div>
                    
                    </div>              
                  </div>
                
                </div>
              {% endif %}
            {% endfor %}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="ingredients-navigation-{{ section.id }}">
        <button class="ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
          <span class="animate-icon"></span>
        </button>
        <div class="ingredients-scrollbar-{{ section.id }} swiper-scrollbar"></div>     
        <button class="ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
          <span class="animate-icon"></span>
        </button>   
      </div>
    </div>
</div>

<div class="ingredients-modal-{{ section.id }}">
  <div class="ingredients-modal-inner-{{ section.id }}">
    {% for block in section.blocks %}
      {% if block.type == 'card' %}
        <div class="ingredients-modal-content-{{ section.id }}" data-id="{{ block.id }}">
          {% if block.settings.sidebar_title != blank %}
            <div class="ingredients-sidebar-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.sidebar_title }}</div>
          {% endif %}
          {% if block.settings.sidebar_subtext != blank %}
            <div class="ingredients-sidebar-subtext-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.sidebar_subtext }}</div>
          {% endif %}
          <{% if block.settings.url %}a href="{{ block.settings.url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="ingredients-sidebar-image-{{ section.id }}">
            {% if block.settings.sidebar_image != blank %}               
              {{ block.settings.sidebar_image | image_url: width: 1500 | image_tag:
                loading: loading_attribute,
                sizes: "(min-width: 1024px) 100vw, 100vw",
                widths: '375, 550, 750, 1100, 1500, 1780, 2000, 3000',
                alt: block.settings.image.alt | escape
              }}
            {% else %}
              {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
            {% endif %}  
          </{% if block.settings.url %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>

          {% if block.settings.sidebar_first_heading != blank %}
            <p class="ingredients-sidebar-heading-{{ section.id }}" style="border: 0px !important;">{{ block.settings.sidebar_first_heading }}</p>
          {% endif %}

          {% if block.settings.sidebar_first_text != blank %}
            <div class="ingredients-sidebar-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.sidebar_first_text }}</div>
          {% endif %}

          {% if block.settings.sidebar_first_table_heading != blank or block.settings.sidebar_first_table_text != blank or block.settings.sidebar_second_table_heading != blank or block.settings.sidebar_second_table_text != blank %}
            <div class="ingredients-sidebar-table-{{ section.id }}">
              <div class="ingredients-sidebar-table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                {% if block.settings.sidebar_first_table_heading != blank %}
                  <p class="ingredients-sidebar-heading-{{ section.id }}" style="margin-top: 0 !important;">{{ block.settings.sidebar_first_table_heading }}</p>
                {% endif %}
                {% if block.settings.sidebar_first_table_text != blank %}
                  <div class="ingredients-sidebar-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.sidebar_first_table_text }}</div>  
                {% endif %}
              </div>
              <div class="ingredients-sidebar-table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                {% if block.settings.sidebar_second_table_heading != blank %}
                  <p class="ingredients-sidebar-heading-{{ section.id }}" style="margin-top: 0 !important;">{{ block.settings.sidebar_second_table_heading }}</p>
                {% endif %}
                {% if block.settings.sidebar_second_table_text != blank %}
                  <div class="ingredients-sidebar-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.sidebar_second_table_text }}</div>  
                {% endif %}
              </div>
            </div>
          {% endif %}

          {% if block.settings.sidebar_second_heading != blank %}
            <p class="ingredients-sidebar-heading-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.sidebar_second_heading }}</p>
          {% endif %}

          {% if block.settings.sidebar_second_text != blank %}
            <div class="ingredients-sidebar-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.sidebar_second_text }}</div>
          {% endif %}
          
        </div>
      {% endif %}
    {% endfor %}
    <button class="ingredients-close-modal-{{ section.id }}">
      <svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none">
        <path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd"
        d="M12.0002 10.586L4.70718 3.29297L3.29297 4.70718L10.586 12.0002L3.29297 19.2933L4.70718 20.7075L12.0002 13.4145L19.2933 20.7075L20.7075 19.2933L13.4145 12.0002L20.7075 4.70723L19.2933 3.29302L12.0002 10.586Z"
        fill="white"></path>
      </svg>        
    </button>
  </div>
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@8/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initProductIngredients7() {
    document.querySelector('.ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }}').classList.remove('preview');

    const slider = new Swiper(".ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }}", {
      speed: 300, 
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
        prevEl: '.ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}',
      },
      scrollbar: {
        el: '.ingredients-scrollbar-{{ section.id }}',
        draggable: true,
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.gapMobile || 0),
          slidesPerView: parseFloat(document.querySelector(`.ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.viewMobile),
        },
        768: {
          spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.gap || 0),
          slidesPerView: parseFloat(document.querySelector(`.ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.viewMobile),
        },
        1024: {
          spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.gap || 0),
          slidesPerView: parseFloat(document.querySelector(`.ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.view || 1),
        }
      },
    }); 

    const tabs = document.querySelectorAll('.ingredients-source-icon-{{ section.id }}');
    const modal = document.querySelector('.ingredients-modal-{{ section.id }}');
    const modalInner = document.querySelector('.ingredients-modal-inner-{{ section.id }}');
    const modalText = document.querySelectorAll('.ingredients-modal-content-{{ section.id }}');
    const closeModal = document.querySelector('.ingredients-close-modal-{{ section.id }}');

    if(tabs) {
      tabs.forEach(tab => {
        tab.addEventListener('click', () => {              
          if(modalText) {
            document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';     
            if(modal) {
              modal.classList.add('active');
              setTimeout(() => {
                modalInner.classList.add('active');
              }, 200)
            } else {              
              modalInner.classList.remove('active');             
              setTimeout(() => {
                modal.classList.remove('active');      
              }, 200)        
            }
            modalText.forEach(e => {
              if(tab.id === e.getAttribute('data-id')) {
                e.classList.add('active');
              } else {
                setTimeout(() => {
                  e.classList.remove('active')  
                }, 200)               
              }
            })
          }
        })
      })
    }

    if(closeModal) {
      closeModal.addEventListener("click", () => {
        document.body.style.overflow = '';   
        if(modal) {     
          modalInner.classList.remove('active');             
          setTimeout(() => {
            modal.classList.remove('active');      
          }, 200)            
        }
        modalText.forEach(e => {          
          setTimeout(() => {
            e.classList.remove('active')  
          }, 200)      
        })
      })
    }

    document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
      if (e.target == modal) {
        document.body.style.overflow = '';   
        modalInner.classList.remove('active');             
        setTimeout(() => {
          modal.classList.remove('active');      
        }, 200)
      }
    });
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initProductIngredients7);
  
  if (Shopify.designMode) {
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initProductIngredients7);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initProductIngredients7);
  }
</script>

background_gradient.label: Section background gradient
background_gradient.description: Remove gradient to replace with solid colors

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
